name: agentic-ai
description: Agentic AI - FastAPI + React monorepo for building AI-powered applications

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=@agentic/ui" "cd apps/api && uv run uvicorn src.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000"
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=@agentic/ui && uv run ruff check .
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=@agentic/ui && uv run black .
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=@agentic/ui && uv run mypy apps/
